title: The Email Trail
description: A phishing email was sent to our organization. We've provided the email headers in a text file. Find the originating IP address (the first 'Received: from' entry). The flag is hidden as the last octet of that IP address. Click on the given hyperlink open the 'Email Headers Challenge' file.
hints: Look for lines starting with 'Received: from' in the headers.
The IP address is in square brackets [xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx].
The flag format is FLAG{lastoctet} where lastoctet is the number after the last dot.
